headers.subject: Re: Notes from BANG meeting

quote.quotepara: Now we all know that MacOS X server will only be supported on the new G3 machines (though may run unsupported on others).

body.para: This is false. MacOS X Server wil e supported on all G3's.
-mab ******* Michael Bartosh bartosh@tamu.edu cell: 409/537.2129 Texas A&M University http://jungfrau.tamu.edu/~bartosh
"The first coding I ever did for NeXTSTEP was on an 040 cube at Microsoft in the Cairo "idea room". We had a bunch of interesting machines and OS's in there to steal ideas from."
